alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Colfax; Cuming; Dodge; Pierce; Stanton; Thurston; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 2:09AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cuming, Wayne, northeastern Colfax, northwestern Dodge, southeastern Pierce, west central Thurston, south central Cedar and eastern Stanton Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 208 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles south of Pierce to 2 miles southeast of Hoskins to 5 miles east of Stanton to 5 miles southeast of Clarkson. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pilger around 215 AM CDT. Winside around 220 AM CDT. Wisner and Dodge around 225 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wayne, Randolph, Snyder, Carroll, West Point and Pender. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cedar; Colfax; Cuming; Dodge; Pierce; Stanton; Thurston; Wayne
